name: Beatjump
description:
This game is a submission for the 2021 Rhythm Jam. 

It is a platformer with a twist. Some platforms only appear on a certain beat, which you can create by collecting notes at the right time. 

Third party assets:

Audio: https://99sounds.org/drum-samples/

Font: https://www.1001freefonts.com/8-bit-operator.font
